column2: Smoque seems to have a system worked out pretty well where you put your order in and once a table is ready
column3: your food is shortly afterwards. For the food
column4: I had the baby back ribs
column5: which weren't as tender as I'm accustomed to
column6: but were very flavorful and delicious with the BBQ sauce. The cornbread was decent
column7: but the mac and cheese...oh the mac and cheese. Absolutely fantastic! I would order extra mac and cheese next time because one little tin of it is not enough! From the crumbled cheese crunchiness on top to the slightly smoked cheesiness inside
column8: this is a must get. I'll be back to get the mac and cheese again...oh and probably try another entree!
